text: Epaminondas Pantelakis (, born 10 February 1995) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Super League club PAS Giannina. ==Career== Pantelakis was born on February 10, 1995 in Chania. He started his career in Ergotelis and with his jersey debuted in the Super League at the age of 19. In January 2015 he loaned to Fostiras, while in the summer of 2015 Olympiacos signed him and immediately loaned him to Kissamikos, where he remained until the end of his contract in June 2018. On 10 August 2018, he signed a three years' contract with Panathinaikos for an undisclosed fee. In August 31, 2019 PAS Giannina signed him. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Greece youth international footballers Category:Super League Greece players Category:Ergotelis F.C. players Category:Olympiacos F.C. players Category:Fostiras F.C. players Category:Panathinaikos F.C. players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:PAS Giannina F.C. players
title: Epaminondas Pantelakis
